application

Class layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.layout

  • public class layout
extends java.lang.Object
    desktop application to view database data using miglayout. uses jdbc driver to connect to server. uses sql query to fetch data from the database. uses java scheduler function to automatically refresh every set seconds. Created by rahul on 24/12/2015.
